subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jelena Jankovic will face a local favorite, the Spaniard Carla Suarez Navarro, in the Andalucia Tennis Experience final Sunday in Marbella, Spain. Jankovic defeated fourth-seeded Anabel Medina Garrigues, 7-5, 6-2, to reach her first final of the season. Suarez Navarro held off seventh-seeded Sorana Cirstea, 6-2, 6-7 (5), 6-2. ¶Lleyton Hewitt of Australia reached his first clay court final in a decade with a 7-6 (4), 6-4 win over Evgeny Korolev of Russia at the United States Men’s Clay Court Championships in Houston. He will face the American Wayne Odesnik, who beat Bjorn Phau of Germany, 6-4, 6-3. houston (AP).
